label: Behavior 46305622
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving west-southwest, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 56.891 - 0.0042 × t, lon(t) ≈ 8.0311 - 0.0054 × t, where t is a normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
